entries.name: FastChat-T5
entries.desc: A commercial-friendly, compact, yet powerful chat assistant fine-tuned from Flan-T5.

entries.name: Vicuna
entries.desc: An open-source chatbot impressing GPT-4 with 90%* ChatGPT quality.

entries.name: Chatbot Arena
entries.desc: A benchmark platform for large language models (LLMs) that features anonymous, randomized battles in a crowdsourced manner. It comes with a leaderboard based on Elo ratings.

entries.name: FastChat
entries.desc: An open and scalable platform for training, finetuning, serving, and evaluating LLM-based chatbots.
